text:
@MattHancock @DHSCgovuk @SkyNews Only the U.K. government could spend all of this time building an app that is worse than similar apps that already exist and which is not compatible with the rest of the world. 👏 👏 👏 

This is the latest in the Government’s omnishambles approach to Covid-19

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

🌍Updates: 15 NY children diagnosed with syndrome possibly tied to COVID-19
